config.includeInSearch: Enable searching for repositories hosted on Bitbucket Cloud (Bitbucket.org)
config.appPassword: Bitbucket Cloud app password (must have permissions for Repositories: Read). Create one at https://bitbucket.org/account under 'Access management' > 'App passwords'.
config.cloneProtocol: Protocol to use to clone a repository. Defaults to 'https'. Valid values are either 'https' or 'ssh'.
